Content: Hi! I’m Jens, a tools programmer with a focus on CI. I’ve got 8 years of game-dev study in the bag, where I am now focusing on making the best in-house tools to help and improve development of a project in any way shape or form.
In my spare time I like to always challenge myself to become better at programming. I like playing the guitar in my spare time as well and I do some fitness to keep myself healthy.
Come say hi on LinkedIn! I love talking tech.
I'm always happy to talk! Feel free to contact me at any time.
